Text: Ken I just wanted to say thanks for all that you and Enron have done for me I know you trusted people close to you and they let you down for that Im sorry I have always believed in you and what you stand for I know i t took tremendous courage to do what you have done over the last couple of weeks Whether the people at Enron like it or not I believe you put us fir st I trust that your decision was the right thing given the circumstances Yes Im deeply hurt by the last month but the true spirit of Enron will l ast within me forever I started at this company a mid level IT Administr ator and I am now a seasoned Director level technologist and leader I hav e had promotions in the last years I have been challenged by this environment I believe that I can go anywhere and be successful because o f meeting those challenges No where else could have provided me these opp ortunities In return Im going to stay committed and have faith that due to that committment the Enron spirit will live on With all the bad I wanted to remind you of the good My years of employment with Enron have been the best of my career No matter what happens I know I will be fine I truly wish you and your family the best Take Care Mike Croucher

Common Data Migration for NetcoPST To all we are compiling a list of all common data documents excel spreadsheets etc contained on our Odrive and Mdrive infrastructure that will be required for NetCo The assumption is that no transactional deal type data will be migrated Please forward any directory names that will be required for Netco to me For example Ocommondirectoryname etcIf there are additional people or resources that I can coordinate with please let me know I am available to meet and assist in anyway possible Thanks Mike Croucher

Common Data Migration for Netcopst To all we are compiling a list of all common data documents excel spreadsheets etc contained on our Odrive and Mdrive infrastructure that will be required for NetCo The assumption is that no transactional deal type data will be migrated Please forward any directory names that will be required for Netco to me For example Ocommondirectoryname etcIf there are additional people or resources that I can coordinate with please let me know I am available to meet and assist in anyway possible Thanks Mike Croucher

Data Requirements Cc PST To all The Enron Net Works infrastructure team is gathering requirements for all common data needed for NEWCO This includes GasPower commercial data and related trading support data Based on the amount of data it can take significant time to migrate so we are on an aggressive schedule We need assistance from key individuals within each related business unit Please respond with a list of individuals that may be able to assist This will be a short effort with the right representation Thanks in advance for your cooperation Mike Croucher

FW Data RequirementsTo all are there any additions to the list below I appreciate any input you may be able to provide Thanks Mike Original Message From Tamma Ramanarao Sent Thursday December AM To Croucher Jr Mike Subject RE Data Requirements Mike These are the areas related to power and the folders they use I included the contact name if you want to check with them Regards Rao Fundamentals and Research Rika Imai OResearch Risk management Stacey White Oerms Scheduling Corry Bentley OClntSvcKsettle Settlements Evelyn Melissa ODCD OClntSvcKsettle Volume Management Thresa Allen OClntSvcKsettle Basically Im trying to obtain a list of all common data files spreadsheets etc on the O drive that will need to be migrated to NEWCO I mainly need the directory path information Odirectorynamedirectoryname I appreciate all the assistance Thanks Mike Original Message From Will Lloyd Sent Wednesday December AM To Imai Rika Tamma Ramanarao Symms Mark Cc Croucher Jr Mike Bailey
